00022 #include "Common/Compat.h"

00031 using namespace Hypertable;

00033 using namespace MetaLogEntryFactory;

00035 namespace {
00036 
00037 struct OrderByTimestamp {
00038   bool operator()(const MetaLogEntryPtr &x, const MetaLogEntryPtr &y)  {
00039     return x->timestamp < y->timestamp;
00040   }
00041 };
00042 
00043 } // local namespace
00044 
00045 RangeServerMetaLog::RangeServerMetaLog(Filesystem *fs, const String &path)
00046     : Parent(fs, path) {
00047 
00048   if (fd() == -1) {
00049     HT_DEBUG_OUT << path <<" exists, recovering..."<< HT_END;
00050     recover(path);
00051     return;
00052   }
00053   write_header();
00054 }
00055 
00056 void RangeServerMetaLog::write_header() {
00057   StaticBuffer buf(RSML_HEADER_SIZE);
00058   MetaLogHeader header(RSML_PREFIX, RSML_VERSION);
00059   header.encode(buf.base, RSML_HEADER_SIZE);
00060 
00061   if (fs().append(fd(), buf, 1) != RSML_HEADER_SIZE)
00062     HT_THROWF(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, "Error writing range server "
00063               "metalog header to file: %s", path().c_str());
00064 
00065   HT_DEBUG_OUT << header << HT_END;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void
00069 RangeServerMetaLog::recover(const String &path) {
00070   String tmp(path);
00071   tmp += ".tmp";
00072 
00073   fs().rename(path, tmp);
00074   fd(create(path));
00075   write_header();
00076 
00077   // copy the metalog and potentially skip the last bad entry
00078   RangeServerMetaLogReaderPtr reader = new RangeServerMetaLogReader(&fs(), tmp);
00079 
00080   try {
00081     MetaLogEntryPtr entry;
00082 
00083     while ((entry = reader->read()))
00084       write(entry.get());
00085   }
00086   catch (Exception &e) {
00087     // last entry could be bad
00088     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00089   }
00090   fs().remove(tmp);
00091 }
00092 
00093 void
00094 RangeServerMetaLog::purge(const RangeStates &rs) {
00095   // write purged entries in a tmp file
00096   String tmp = format("%s%d", path().c_str(), getpid());
00097   int fd = create(tmp, true);
00098   MetaLogEntries entries;
00099 
00100   foreach(const RangeStateInfo *i, rs) {
00101     if (i->transactions.empty()) {
00102       MetaLogEntry *entry = new_rs_range_loaded(i->table, i->range,
00103                                                 i->range_state);
00104       entry->timestamp = i->timestamp; // important
00105       entries.push_back(entry);
00106     }
00107     else foreach (const MetaLogEntryPtr &p, i->transactions)
00108       entries.push_back(p);
00109   }
00110   std::sort(entries.begin(), entries.end(), OrderByTimestamp());
00111   foreach(MetaLogEntryPtr &e, entries) write(e.get());
00112   fs().close(fd);
00113 
00114   // rename existing log to name.save and tmp file to the log name
00115   {
00116     ScopedLock lock(mutex());
00117     String save = format("%s.save", path().c_str());
00118     fs().rename(path(), save);
00119     fs().rename(tmp, path());
00120   }
00121 
00122   // reopen
00123   Parent::fd(create(path()));
00124 }
